description: This file defines a React component named Skills that renders a grid of skill items with accessible tooltips. It includes a subcomponent SkillPill for individual skill display, handling user interactions such as hover and keyboard events.

methods.name: Skills
methods.description: Main React component that renders a grid of skills with accessibility features.

methods.name: SkillPill
methods.description: Subcomponent that renders individual skill items with tooltip and interaction handling.
